metadata.dc:author: Alvarez-Domínguez, Tania
Avilés-Salas, Alejandro
metadata.dc:description: Osseous metaplasia (OM) in colonic adenocarcinoma is a very rare occurrence. This report describes the case of a 59-year-old man with OM occurring with moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma of colon, and is followed by a brief review of the literature.
metadata.dc:title: Metaplasia ósea en adenocarcinoma de colon.
[Osseous metaplasia in colonic adenocarcinoma].
